ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: Patch Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same problem. I got so mad that nothing i did worked i downloaded everything they tell  you too. Got so pissed a broke mhy computer so im of to buy a
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same problem. I got so mad that nothing i
did worked i downloaded everything they tell you too.
Got so pissed a broke mhy computer so im of to buy a
brand new computer.=)
--- timmye_ea <no_reply@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> I had the same issue. And looking at EQ's support
> page will not tell
> you the correct fix for it. They claim that you
> should download a new
> EverQuest.exe file and run it. This will not fix the
> issue. If you
> read further on the page, they briefly talk about
> the patcher not
> working correctly if Internet Explorer is not
> installed on your pc.
> They FAIL to mention that you need to be running IE
> 5.5 or better for
> it to work at all. I was running 5.0 and it would
> not connect to the
> patcher. I downloaded and installed 5.5, rebooted,
> and WHAM! I'm
> online.
>
> Hope this helps you,
>
> Timmye Cousteau
> 35 Druid of Karana
>
> --- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "a nomad soul"
> <sasank@d...> wrote:
> > YES!
> >
> > i spent hours downloading the patch
> > still dont have the jagged pines patch
> > and now my patcher wont connect
> > ive checked my isp connection...tested it
> > but the patcher still tells me to check my isp or
> contact sony
> > im waiting for tech support to get back with me
> now
> >
> > grrrrrr
> >
> > nomiea
> > 44 wood elf druid
> > xev server, ancient fellowship
